page.title: 15CHILDRENS CLUBS AT ASTON
page.content: ASTON-ON-TRENT IS A SMALL VILLAGE WITH A POPULATION OF ABOUT 1600.THERE ARE LOTS OF CHILDREN'S CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES.THERE ARE CUBS, SCOUTS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES. YOU CAN GO FOOTBALL TRAINING AND PLAY MATCHES IF YOU ARE GOOD ENOUGH. THERE ARE TEAMS SUCH AS CAVALIERS, WILLINGTON, CHESAPEAKE AND MORE. THEY ALL PLAY FOR A LEAGUE CALLED COTTON LANE COMMUNITY LEAGUE. THERE IS ALSO A CRICKET LEAGUE AND WE PRACTISE ON THURSDAY EVENINGS. SCOUTS DO MANY ACTIVITIES LIKE CAMPING, SWIMMING IN GALAS AND FISHING. THEY ALSO HAVE COMPETITIONS AND PLAY GAMES LIKE RUGBY, BULLDOG AND CRAB FOOTBALL. GUIDES CAMP AT ASTON MILL FARM AND HAVE CAMPFIRES. THE PLAYING FIELD IN ASTON ISN'T TOO GOOD BUT IT HAS A SLIDE, SWINGS, A CLIMGING FRAME AND A SEE-SAW.SOME OF THE CLUBS STARTED IN WESTON AND MOVED TO ASTON.
